apple_vendor_description: The kiss emoji between a woman and a person with medium to medium-light skin tones on Apple devices features two faces gently pressing together, with rosy cheeks and closed eyes conveying affection. Apple's smooth gradients and soft lighting create a tender and intimate visual, emphasizing the warmth of the moment. This emoji, with its delicate rendering and rounded edges, beautifully captures romantic affection, deep fondness, or a sweet goodbye in digital communication.
